LanguageData.BondedAnimalLost.stages.bonded_animal_lo: Such a tender, unique animal. This universe is evil!
LanguageData.BondedAnimalReleased.stages.bonded_anima: Such a tender, unique animal. Why did it have to go?
LanguageData.ColonistLost.stages.colonist_lost.label: colonist lost
LanguageData.ColonistLost.stages.colonist_lost.descri: We just lost someone of our colony in a tragic way.
LanguageData.MyAuntLost.stages.my_aunt_lost.label: my aunt {0} lost
LanguageData.MyAuntLost.stages.my_aunt_lost.descripti: My aunt has gone lost. I hope she will get back to us someday.

LanguageData.PawnWithBadOpinionLost.stages.my_rival_l: Serves them right. At least there's some justice in this world.
LanguageData.PawnWithGoodOpinionLost.stages.my_friend: Such a wonderful person, lost. The universe gets darker every day.
